tdmtpy.tensor.Tensor.write¶

Tensor.write(inv_type, df)[source]¶

Write detailed solution file

A function that saves the detailed moment tensor solution to a file named d[depth].mtinv.out, where depth is the inverted source depth in attribute inverted.depth.

Parameters

  • inv_type (str) – type of moment tensor inversion, deviatoric or full.

  • df (DataFrame) – updated station table from attribute config.df in Inversion.
